articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: At least 10 people were killed and 30 injured when a truck drove into a large crowd on Canal and Bourbon Street in New Orleans' French Quarter early on Wednesday.
articles.title: At least 10 dead after truck crashes into New Orleans crowd, city agency says

articles.author: David Shepardson, Karen Brettell, Ronda Churchill
articles.description: A Tesla Cybertruck exploded in flames outside the Trump International Hotel Las Vegas on Wednesday, killing the driver and injuring seven others, and the FBI was investigating whether the blast was an act of terrorism, officials said.
articles.title: Tesla Cybertruck explodes outside Trump Las Vegas hotel, killing driver

articles.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Jihoon Lee
articles.description: Investigators to seize materials related to aircraft maintenance and operation of airport facilities.
articles.title: South Korea police search Jeju Air, airport operator over fatal plane crash

articles.author: Hyun Yi
articles.description: The impeached president faces an attempt by authorities to arrest him over his short-lived Dec. 3 martial law.
articles.title: South Korea's Yoon, facing unprecedented arrest over martial law, vows to 'fight until end'

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A gunman who killed at least 10 people in a rampage in a small town in Montenegro died from self-inflicted injuries on Thursday after attempting suicide, the country's interior minister, Danilo Saranovic, said.
articles.title: Suspect in Montenegro shooting dies after attempting suicide

articles.author: Brian Thevenot
articles.description: Investigators in New Orleans were searching for what motivated a U.S. Army veteran flying an ISIS flag from his truck to plow into a crowd of New Year's revelers, killing 15 people and injuring 30 more before dying in a shootout with police.
articles.title: Police probe motive in New Orleans truck rampage

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ten people were injured in a mass shooting in the New York City borough of Queens late on New Year's Day, the New York Police Department said in a news briefing early on Thursday.
articles.title: 10 people injured in New York City shooting incident, NYPD says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: An Israeli airstrike killed at least 10 Palestinians in a tent encampment sheltering displaced families in southern Gaza strip early on Thursday, medics said.
articles.title: Israeli airstrike kills at least 10 in southern Gaza, medics say

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Indonesia's Constitutional Court on Thursday said a law setting a minimum vote level before political parties could nominate a presidential candidate was not legally binding, which could potentially lead to a wider slate of nominees running in 2029.
articles.title: Indonesia court says vote threshold for presidential candidates not legally binding

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Russia said on Thursday it had attacked energy facilities in Ukraine that support Kyiv's military-industrial complex.
articles.title: Russia says it struck Ukrainian energy facilities
